sense.gloss: to be careful, to be discreet
to do in moderation, to refrain (from overdoing), to abstain
to be purified, to be chaste

sdata.e: You are asked to refrain from smoking until the sign is switched off.

sdata.j: ↑相乗↑↓あいの↓りしている↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑他↑↓た↓の↑乗客↑↓じょうきゃく↓との↑会話↑↓かいわ↓を|↑慎↑↓つつし↓む|べきだ。
sdata.e: People sharing a ride should refrain from conversation with other passengers.
